message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the income statement.

In an income statement, the line item that represents the carrying amount of inventories sold is typically "Cost of Goods Sold" (COGS). This represents the direct costs attributable to the production of the goods sold by the company.

Looking at the provided income statement, I can see the following line item:
- Cost of Goods Sold: 3250000.00 (dated 2024-01-29)

This is the value I need to extract as the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '3250000.00'} }
```
